bg_change_profile.message: Sync complete, your profile has been changed to $newProfileName$.

bg_currently_busy.message: Xmarks is already processing an action ($currentAction$), no changes can be made until it is finished!

bg_currently_syncing.message: Xmarks is currently synchronizing, no changes can be made until it is finished.

bg_invalid_auth.message: Invalid username or password, not signed in

bg_invalid_download.message: Invalid username or password, download canceled

bg_invalid_sync.message: Invalid username or password, sync canceled. Please relogin.

bg_invalid_upload.message: Invalid username or password, upload canceled

bg_no_profile.message: Sync complete, this machine is no longer using a sync profile.

bg_no_profiles_list.message: Unable to get list of sync profiles

bg_no_server_data.message: You have no $syncType$ saved on our servers.  You must do an upload from this browser before you can begin synchronizing.  Would you like to upload your $syncType$ now?

bg_no_user_data.message: No data on server for user, download canceled

bg_not_continuous.message: You restored or uploaded $syncType$ from another computer to our servers. You can sync normally (the safest choice), or you can download the server $syncType$, overwriting your local $syncType$. Which do you prefer?

bg_possible_error.message: This can also be caused by a sync error, $openLink$learn about$endLink$ common errors.

bg_profile_changed.message: Your profile has been changed! Xmarks is now going to sync with the server to add and remove the appropriate bookmarks for this profile.

bg_profile_download_error.message: Error during download, profile change not completed!

bg_profile_sync_error.message: Error during sync, profile not changed!

bg_upload_profile_error.message: Error while sending upload with profile

browseraction_remote_tabs_nodata.message: No remote tabs found.  To use this feature, enable Xmarks Tab Sync in other browsers and computers.

dialog_error_download.message:
Xmarks has detected an error while synchronizing your bookmarks. Downloading the current snapshot from the server usually fixes this, but will cause you to lose any local changes that have not been synchronized. Would you like to perform a download?

WARNING: If you are using Chrome Sync for bookmarks, it is possible that running both sync services on the same data is responsible for duplicates and Xmarks sync errors.

Learn how to turn off Chrome Bookmark Sync.

extension_description.message: Backup and sync your bookmarks and open tabs across computers and browsers. Xmarks is also available for Firefox, Safari and IE.

firsttimesync_download.message: Keep bookmarks on the server; discard those on this computer.

firsttimesync_download_description.message: Xmarks will download your bookmarks from the server.

firsttimesync_download_warning.message: Note: This will ERASE bookmarks currently on this computer.

firsttimesync_merge_local.message: Merge bookmarks with server, starting with this computer.

firsttimesync_merge_local_description.message: Xmarks will now merge your bookmarks, starting with your local bookmarks.

firsttimesync_merge_server.message: Merge bookmarks with server, starting with the server.

firsttimesync_merge_server_description.message: Xmarks will now merge your bookmarks, starting with your server bookmarks.

firsttimesync_perform.message: How do you want Xmarks to perform initial synchronization?

firsttimesync_ready.message: You are now ready to synchronize your bookmarks.

firsttimesync_upload.message: Discard bookmarks on the server; keep bookmarks on this computer.

firsttimesync_upload_description.message: Xmarks will upload your bookmarks to the server.

firsttimesync_upload_warning.message: Note: This will ERASE bookmarks currently on the server.

pindialog_details.message: To sync your saved passwords with this computer, please enter your PIN.

settings_logging_info.message: To see log output, go to chrome://extensions/ and click the link to inspect the background.html view for Xmarks. (Note: if you don't see the option to inspect anything, you'll need to click the "Developer mode" link in the top right first.) Our log data is printed to the console, which can be toggled using the buttons at the bottom of the inspector. Any Chrome errors will be printed in red.

settings_manual_download_desc.message: Downloading your bookmarks will overwrite the data currently on this computer with the saved data you have on our servers.

settings_manual_upload_desc.message: Uploading your bookmarks will send this browser's data to our servers.  This will replace any data you currently have saved on our servers.

settings_not_loaded.message: Xmarks for Chrome hasn't been fully loaded yet!  Please refresh this page to load the settings.

settings_profiles_description.message: Use sync profiles to keep sensitive bookmarks where they belong.  Create and manage sync profiles at my.xmarks.com. Then choose a profile here to control what Xmarks syncs to and from this computer.

settings_restore_description.message: Use this feature to restore your bookmarks to an earlier version.  Choose from any of the previous bookmarks sets safely backed up in your Xmarks web account over the last six months.

settings_unable_to_communicuate.message: Unable to communicate with the server.

settings_updated.message: Xmarks for Chrome has been updated!  Recent changes and bug fixes can be found by clicking the $startLink$Recent changes$endLink$ link.

syncprofiles_no_profiles.message: You haven't created any sync profiles yet. Would you like to go to http://my.xmarks.com and set up a profile?
